text:
There ain't no gold in this river
That I've been washin' my hands in forever

But I can't bring myself to swim
When I am drowning in this silence

Go easy on me, baby
I was still a child
Didn't get the chance to
Feel the world around me
I had no time to choose
What I chose to do
So go easy on me
There ain't no room for things to change
When we are both so deeply stuck in our ways
You can't deny how hard I've tried
I changed who I was to put you both first
But now I give up
Go easy on me, baby
I was still a child
Didn't get the chance to
Feel the world around me
Had no time to choose
What I chose to do
So go easy on me
I had good intentions
And the highest hopes
But I know right now
It probably doesn't even show
Go easy on me, baby
I was still a child
I didn't get the chance to
Feel the world around me
I had no time to choose
What I chose to do
So go easy on me

text:
Adele,I'll take a bullet for you to reply to this comment
Please read this message to you. It will mean my life to me. 

You deserve the multiverse and more. I love you to bits and you are my no.1 person. You have AMAZING songs and a BEAUTIFUL personality. You are so beautiful and kind. I wish I can meet you but I live in South Africa. I want to be at your next show but I can't. You are a very strong and amazing woman. I had a really depressing and bad day this week and I saw a video of you where you were laughing so hard and I must say: your happiness and laughter has made my day a trillion times better. Now when I have a bad day I go search that video on tiktok.

You are my person. You are my idol and favourite music artist

If you read my comment it will mean my life to me

A message from your biggest fan: Mia

I love you and appreciate you

❤❤❤💕💕💕💝💝💝

text:
*Adele - Easy On Me (Official Video) [Lyrics:] June 11, 2023*
*[Verse 1]*
*There ain't no gold in this river*
*That I've been washin' my hands in forever*
*I know there is hope in these waters*
*But I can't bring myself to swim*
*When I am drowning in this silence*
*Baby, let me in*

*[Chorus]*
*Go easy on me, baby*
*I was still a child*
*Didn't get the chance to*
*Feel the world around me*
*I had no time to choose what I chose to do*
*So go easy on me*

*[Verse 2]*
*There ain't no room for things to change*
*When we are both so deeply stuck in our ways*
*You can't deny how hard I've tried*
*I changed who I was to put you both first*
*But now I give up*

*[Chorus]*
*Go easy on mе, baby*
*I was still a child*
*Didn't get the chance to*
*Feel thе world around me*
*Had no time to choose what I chose to do*
*So go easy on me*

*[Bridge]*
*I had good intentions*
*And the highest hopes*
*But I know right now*
*It probably doesn't even show*

*[Chorus]*
*Go easy on me, baby*
*I was still a child*
*I didn't get the chance to*
*Feel the world around me*
*I had no time to choose what I chose to do*
*So go easy on me*

*Author(s): Greg Kurstin, Adele Adkins*
